original_text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,
korean_text: 능히 너희를 보호하사 거침이 없게 하시고 너희로 그 영광 앞에 흠이 없이 기쁨으로 서게 하실 이

sentences.original_text: that is able to keep you from falling
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 실족하지 않게 지키실 수 있는

sentences.original_text: before the presence of his glory
